name: Bank Cards

metadata.exclusions: No known exclusions beyond documented table/model constraints.
metadata.confidence_notes: Validated against seeded demo dataset; verify against production policies before external reporting.

business_purpose: Card inventory and status tracking for issued customer debit and credit cards.

key_columns.name: status
key_columns.business_meaning: Card status such as active or blocked

common_queries: SELECT status, COUNT(*) FROM bank_cards GROUP BY status
SELECT network, COUNT(*) FROM bank_cards GROUP BY network
gotchas: Blocked cards can still have historical transactions
